label: uncl5153
comment: Code specifying a type of duty, tax or fee.

values.label: Petroleum tax
values.comment: A tax levied on the volume of petroleum being transacted.

values.label: Provisional countervailing duty cash
values.comment: Countervailing duty paid in cash prior to a formal finding of subsidization by Customs.

values.label: Provisional countervailing duty bond
values.comment: Countervailing duty paid by posting a bond during an investigation period prior to a formal decision on subsidization by Customs.

values.label: Tobacco tax
values.comment: A tax levied on tobacco products.

values.label: Energy fee
values.comment: General fee or tax for the use of energy.

values.label: Coffee tax
values.comment: A tax levied specifically on coffee products.

values.label: Harmonised sales tax, Canadian
values.comment: A harmonized sales tax consisting of a goods and service tax, a Canadian provincial sales tax and, as applicable, a Quebec sales tax which is recoverable.

values.label: Quebec sales tax
values.comment: A sales tax charged within the Canadian province of Quebec which is recoverable.

values.label: Canadian provincial sales tax
values.comment: A sales tax charged within Canadian provinces which is non-recoverable.

values.label: Tax on replacement part
values.comment: A tax levied on a replacement part, where the original part is returned.

values.label: Mineral oil tax
values.comment: Tax that is levied specifically on products containing mineral oil.

values.label: Special tax
values.comment: To indicate a special type of tax.

values.label: Insurance tax
values.comment: A tax levied specifically on insurances.

values.label: Provincial Cannabis Tax
values.comment: A tax levied on Cannabis products

values.label: Outstanding duty interest
values.comment: Fee levied due to outstanding duties to be paid

values.label: Anti-dumping duty
values.comment: Duty applied to goods ruled to have been dumped in an import market at a price lower than that in the exporter's domestic market.

values.label: Stamp duty (Imposta di Bollo)
values.comment: Tax required in Italy, which may be fixed or graduated in various circumstances (e.g. VAT exempt documents or bank receipts).

values.label: Agricultural levy
values.comment: Levy imposed on agricultural products where there is a difference between the selling price between trading countries.

values.label: Car tax
values.comment: A tax that is levied on the value of the automobile.

values.label: Paper consortium tax (Italy)
values.comment: Italian Paper consortium tax.

values.label: Commodity specific tax
values.comment: Tax related to a specified commodity, e.g. illuminants, salts.

values.label: Customs duty
values.comment: Duties laid down in the Customs tariff, to which goods are liable on entering or leaving the Customs territory (CCC).

values.label: Countervailing duty
values.comment: A duty on imported goods applied for compensate for subsidies granted to those goods in the exporting country.

values.label: Environmental tax
values.comment: Tax assessed for funding or assuring environmental protection or clean-up.

values.label: Excise duty
values.comment: Customs or fiscal authorities code to identify a specific or ad valorem levy on a specific commodity, applied either domestically or at time of importation.

values.label: Agricultural export rebate
values.comment: Monetary rebate given to the seller in certain circumstances when agricultural products are exported.

values.label: Federal excise tax
values.comment: Tax levied by the federal government on the manufacture of specific items.

values.label: Free
values.comment: No tax levied.

values.label: General construction tax
values.comment: General tax for construction.

values.label: Goods and services tax
values.comment: Tax levied on the final consumption of goods and services throughout the production and distribution chain.

values.label: Illuminants tax
values.comment: Tax of illuminants.

values.label: Import tax
values.comment: Tax assessed on imports.

values.label: Individual tax
values.comment: A tax levied based on an individual's ability to pay.

values.label: Business license fee
values.comment: Government assessed charge for permit to do business.

values.label: Local construction tax
values.comment: Local tax for construction.

values.label: Light dues payable
values.comment: Fee levied on a vessel to pay for port navigation lights.

values.label: Local sales tax
values.comment: Assessment charges on sale of goods or services by city, borough country or other taxing authorities below state or provincial level.

values.label: Lust tax
values.comment: Tax imposed for clean-up of leaky underground storage tanks.

values.label: Monetary compensatory amount
values.comment: Levy on Common Agricultural Policy (European Union) goods used to compensate for fluctuating currencies between member states.

values.label: Miscellaneous cash deposit
values.comment: Duty paid and held on deposit, by Customs, during an investigation period prior to a final decision being made on any aspect related to imported goods (except valuation) by Customs.

values.label: Other taxes
values.comment: Unspecified, miscellaneous tax charges.

values.label: Provisional duty bond
values.comment: Anti-dumping duty paid by posting a bond during an investigation period prior to a formal decision on dumping by Customs.

values.label: Provisional duty cash
values.comment: Anti-dumping duty paid in cash prior to a formal finding of dumping by Customs.

values.label: Preference duty
values.comment: Duties laid down in the Customs tariff, to which goods are liable on entering or leaving the Customs territory falling under a preferential regime such as Generalised System of Preferences (GSP).

values.label: Special construction tax
values.comment: Special tax for construction.

values.label: Shifted social securities
values.comment: Social securities share of the invoice amount to be paid directly to the social securities collector.

values.label: State/provincial sales tax
values.comment: All applicable sale taxes by authorities at the state or provincial level, below national level.

values.label: Suspended duty
values.comment: Duty suspended or deferred from payment.

values.label: Surtax
values.comment: A tax or duty applied on and in addition to existing duties and taxes.

values.label: Shifted wage tax
values.comment: Wage tax share of the invoice amount to be paid directly to the tax collector(s office).

values.label: Alcohol mark tax
values.comment: A tax levied based on the type of alcohol being obtained.

values.label: Total
values.comment: The summary amount of all taxes.

values.label: Turnover tax
values.comment: Tax levied on the total sales/turnover of a corporation.

values.label: Tonnage taxes
values.comment: Tax levied based on the vessel's net tonnage.

values.label: Valuation deposit
values.comment: Duty paid and held on deposit, by Customs, during an investigation period prior to a formal decision on valuation of the goods being made.

values.label: Value added tax
values.comment: A tax on domestic or imported goods applied to the value added at each stage in the production/distribution cycle.
